feed.title: Abacus Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Abacus: 0.15.0
entry.content:
After successful App Store/Google Play reviews, version 0.15.0 will be available here:

iOS: apps.apple.com Android: play.google.com

What's Changed

  • Hide inactive bills #274
  • Display error message for transactions #265
  • New filters for Transactions list: Account & From Date
  • version/0.15.0 by @victorbalssa in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/273

Full Changelog: https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/compare/0.14.0...0.15.0

entry.title: New release for Abacus: 0.16.0
entry.content:
After successful App Store/Google Play reviews, version 0.16.0 will be available here:

iOS: apps.apple.com Android: play.google.com

What's Changed

  • new: EXPO SDK 51 #285
  • fix bug: Login redirection loop #270
  • fix bug: Transaction source account cannot be edited #282
  • italian translations by @maramazza in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/278
  • russian translations by @NiteNeal in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/283

New Contributors

  • @maramazza made their first contribution in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/278

Full Changelog: https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/compare/0.15.0...0.16.0

entry.title: New release for Abacus: 0.18.0
entry.content:
After successful App Store/Google Play reviews, version 0.18.0 will be available here:

iOS: apps.apple.com Android: play.google.com

❗️ Sentry apk is for debugging only

What's Changed

  • translations/italian by @Elmagenta in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/289
  • feature/piggy-banks-home by @andyslucky in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/287
  • Update french translations by @hamza-fadil in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/291
  • translations/italian by @Maxco10 in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/295
  • feature/sort-accounts by @hamza-fadil in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/297
  • feature/close-on-transaction-complete-option by @hamza-fadil in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/296
  • version/0.17 by @victorbalssa in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/299
  • translation/french-and-readme-up by @hamza-fadil in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/300
  • fix/cleanup-reset-state by @hamza-fadil in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/306
  • translation/german by @marcelweikum in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/308
  • version/0.18.0 by @victorbalssa in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/309

New Contributors

  • @Elmagenta made their first contribution in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/289
  • @andyslucky made their first contribution in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/287
  • @hamza-fadil made their first contribution in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/291
  • @Maxco10 made their first contribution in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/295
  • @marcelweikum made their first contribution in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/308

Full Changelog: https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/compare/0.16.0...0.18.0

entry.title: New release for Abacus: 0.20.0
